[4] Controlling nitrogen emissions at both the local (plantation) and regional scales is necessary to prevent large-scale palm oil production from having very serious effects on regional air quality. [5] Genetic modification of the oil palm cultivar to extinguish isoprene emissions (as already demonstrated for poplar [ref. [8] The utility of palm oil as an environmentally friendly crop may be therefore severely time-limited.
